members.name: setValue
members.comment: Sets the value of the argument.

members.name: isValid
members.comment: Performs basic sanity check of argument.

return: true if value is a string representation of a boolean value.

members.name: stringValueOf
members.comment: Return the string representation of the value parameter. Does not set or examine the current value of this instance.

return: the localized String representation of the boolean value.

members.name: booleanValue
members.comment: Return the value of the argument as a boolean. Since the argument may not have been set or may have an invalid value isValid(String) should be called on Connector.Argument.value() to check its validity. If it is invalid the boolean returned by this method is undefined.

return: the value of the argument as a boolean.

name: com.sun.jdi.connect.Connector$BooleanArgument
comment: Specification for and value of a Connector argument, whose value is Boolean. Boolean values are represented by the localized versions of the strings "true" and "false".
